name: MonoChrom
description:
[2 PLAYERS ONLY]

WSAD - orange player
Arrow keys - blue player

[UPDATE 01.02.2017 v1.1]

* Players all "filled"

* Timer sound is quieter

Game is only for 2 players at this moment (I am going to make 2+ and team game modes)
Your target is touch so many cubes as you can. If you touch your enemy's cube - cube is your. You have 30 seconds for this.
